title: How it started VS How it's Going #chalkgust
They are scared of us #american #resist #chalkgust
The Congresswoman Cancelled Breakfast, So I Brought My Breakfast to Her | Tennessee District 1
description:
On August 21, 2025, Diana Harshbarger (TN-1) was scheduled to speak at a local event called "Breakfast with the Congresswoman". 

Since her constituents have been asking for, begging for and demanding a town hall for the entirety of congressional recess, many of us purchased tickets (because no, it wasn't free) to attend. But the event was cancelled last minute without explanation. 

I decided to show up and have breakfast with the congresswoman anyway. And share a legislative update so the district can stay informed. 

If you live in District 1, please share this video, call Diana's office and demand a Town Hall ASAP. Then register to vote and make sure she doesn't get to keep her seat in 2026.

DC OFFICE (202) 225-6356

title: Full Breakdown: ICE Activity, Checkpoints, and the Rise of a Police State in Tennessee
description:
*This video represents my personal views and lived experiences. All email correspondence shown has been redacted to protect privacy. No accusations are being made against any individual or institution. This content is shared in the interest of public awareness, transparency, and community safety under the protections of the First Amendment.*

This is the full, in-depth version of my recent TikTok video that documented what I witnessed in East Tennessee: unusual ICE activity, THP checkpoints, and the rapid construction of a police state. 

Original Tiktok Upload | https://youtu.be/q7SAS5xjLU4?si=vje6eqHPGbKcHXEq

Watch Chelsea and Hilario's full story | https://www.newschannel5.com/news/new...

WHAT TO DO IF YOU SEE ICE IN YOUR COMMUNITY:

Document: Record video if safe. Get license plates, faces, and identifying details. Don‚Äôt intervene directly.

Follow safely: If you're in a vehicle and can do so without putting yourself at risk, you can discreetly follow to observe where they go or who they target. Stay at a distance.

Call local authorities and representatives: Demand they stop cooperating with ICE, protect your community, and ban masked or unidentified agents from operating on city property.

Show up: Attend town halls, city council meetings, and speak out. Your presence matters. Pressure local leaders to refuse ICE collaboration, especially without warrants or transparency.

Don't spread unverified reports: Only share confirmed sightings. Spreading false information can cause panic and hurt the movement‚Äôs credibility. 

Know your rights & help others know theirs: 
Don‚Äôt speak to ICE agents without a lawyer present.

Be alert, be responsible, and take action to protect yourself and your community.

If you seen masked men kidnapping someone in the streets, call 911 IMMEDIATELY

description:
Update***

This is the text I received from the staff member I spoke with, who SAID he would be willing to sit down with me in person to discuss the facts of this bill:


ZAC: 
Kristi, this is Zac Rutherford. Congresswoman Harshbarger‚Äôs chief of staff. Thank you for taking time from your busy day to visit with us. I am no longer available this evening but wanted to share the Congresswoman‚Äôs statement on the passage of the historic Big, beautiful Bill. Please make sure to follow our Facebook page and twitter as we share specifics on how President Trumps and the Congresswoman are delivering for East Tennessee families. Lastly I want to suggest you might consider filming at a better angle next time.

God bless!


MY RESPONSE: When will you be available this week for me to drop off the information Diana needs to better understand what she just voted on?

ZAC: She knows exactly what she voted for. My email address is ---

MY RESPONSE: I would like to hand them to you in person so I know they were received. 

ZAC: That won‚Äôt be necessary, email works .

MY RESPONSE: Of course. Have the night you deserve.


--- 

At the time I am uploading this, they are voting. I do not know if it will pass or fail. But this video will live on as a proof that they are actively lying about this bill. And I want to post it to show YOU that YOU have power and a voice. And you always have the option to not only call and email, but to show up in person and demand your voice be heard.

title: I think it's time to share my thoughts
description:
Thank you for listening to my rambling. Feel free to share your thoughts in the comments below. 

And remember:
*You are not obligated to be kind to your oppressors. You have every right to be angry and sad if you feel threatened. You have every right to feel. Be kind to yourself. And be kind to others. Think critically.  Question others and question yourself. Think before you post. Rest your body and your mind. Find ways to spark joy in your life. And know that we are all in this together. If I did a poor job at articulating this message in the video, please know I'm trying my best to balance responsibility and authenticity*

title: Should We Tolerate Blind Faith? | An Ex-Christian Perspective
description:
Responding to a comment left on my channel about tolerating faith, even when it leads to unnecessary harm:

_"You say in this video that believing something without evidence to make yourself comfortable (faith, as you defined it) is ok. I would say it's never ok. I've seen enough harm come from faith that I'm willing to say it more often than not leads to unnecessary harm. Is the faith of the astrology girly as immediately harmful as that of Steven Anderson? Of course not. But the astrology girly is legitimizing a faulty way of knowing, and once that's legitimized in her mind, anyone can use it to put anything they want in there. This is the absolute minimum harm faith can do; create an unnecessary vulnerability to further harm. Even so, I don't like how this belief of mine that faith is harmful makes me think of others. Whether right or wrong, it makes me incapable of truly tolerating people with nonsense beliefs. I say nothing of it irl, of course, but there's always a passive moral judgement and mistrust of anyone who'd allow faith to take hold of their mind. I'd really like that to not be true of me. To that end, could you maybe explain how you can be so comfortable with faith that you can call having it "ok" ?"_

*Please keep in mind that all everything I say here is my subjective opinion, and is intended to deconstruct fundamentalist/evangelical/conservative Christian ideologies from an ex christian perspective*

title: 5 Bible Passages That Caused Me To Lose My Faith
description:
Here are five Bible passages that played a key role in my deconstruction journey and ultimately led me to lose my faith. Each of these verses challenged the image of a loving and just god that I grew up with, making it difficult for me to reconcile the doctrines I once believed. In this video, I share my thoughts on why these passages troubled me and how they sparked deeper questions about the nature of god and the validity of the Bible itself. If you're on a similar path of questioning and seeking clarity, I hope my perspective helps you feel less alone.
